thread.title: Darlene
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Darlene

author: Darlene
title: Darlene
text: I tried a small package of the Abena Abri-Flex Premium pull-ons, looking for something that would allow mom to sleep through the night and not wake up in a soaked bed. These are wonderful! They have a snug fit, airy but strong enough to be able to get them up without tearing them; yet the side seams tear apart for easy removal when they are full! They keep her body dry, so no more rashes, and keep her pajamas and the bed dry! I have now gotten my first case, pricing is fair, delivery was on time and no damaged to box. I would definitely recommend these to anyone who is incontinent at night!
